attributes.action: Make medical insurance compulsory for  foreign nationals entering the UK
attributes.additional_details: Emergency and Non emergency treatment for foreign nationals should  be covered by  compulsory insurance before any treatment is given, the NHS is not recovering the  cost of tourist healthcare and should be able to charge the insurance company directly to be paid immediately  treatment  is ceased
attributes.background:
Make medical insurance compulsory  for foreign nationals entering the UK.
The Nhs cannot  keep funding  tourists health and not recovering the cost.
Make  insurance compulsory for travellers  arriving  in the UK  and non emergency  treatment should  only take place  upon  proof of  insurance
